detection.description:
[Device 0e8398d29d3b0000](https://extrahop-bd.cloud.extrahop.com#/metrics/devices/71c6ffe3ae8548bbbb9bf279c912d3ae.0e8398d29d3b0000/overview?from=1739982210&interval_type=DT&until=1739982300) sent ICMP requests that contain unique payloads to an external IP address. The number of requests was unusually high compared to past activity for this device. Check for unexpected or unauthorized activity, such as hidden information within ping packets.

This device sent approximately 13000 ICMP requests with unique payloads to external hosts.
